Name: "Golub" 92 Match (G92M)
Description:
After a week of bugs, fixes and more bugs, the Golub 92 Match is completed. 
- Fitted with a USP Match weight, the slide from a Beretta M9, and a Glock 18's frame.
- Chambered in .45 ACP
- Comes with a scrap version

Unfortunately the Purple Edition seen in the video and images didn't get into the final mod - partly because I wanted to keep it for myself, being the greedy tosspot that I am. Ok COMPLETELY because I'm a greedy tosspot.

If enough people ask I might make some non-match versions and more realistic variations using the H3VR model's textures so the gun looks more cobbled together. You can ask on discord at SovietPigeon#7650

Anyways, have fun.

REQUESTED FEATURES - 
Slide release button
ShortDescription: USP Match, Beretta M9, and Glock 18 hybrid
